name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami Airport West/Doral

reviews.text: Stayed there August 2004. Lowest bed I have ever seen. Mattress was quite thin. Buffet breakfast - eggs were runny, service was slow (to get my bill!). Hot tub was great.
reviews.title: Mediocre room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I picked the title for my review for 2 reasons. The good reason was that there actually is a guard at the front gate that you have to pass in order to drive in. The bad reason was that the side entrance to the hotel's door was broken and unlocked all night (you are supposed to swipe your card to enter). There were a few sketching people hanging out in the parking lot also but they were probably just guests.
reviews.title: Be on your guard at the Courtyard

reviews.text: We picked this hotel for a shopping-Miami trip and the location was perfect for that. It is pretty central to the major shopping centres. It is about a 30min drive from Miami Beach so if you're looking for nightlife this is not the place to stay.
reviews.title: Ok for travellers, not ideal for tourists

likes.disliked: — No restaurant or bar on site

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was clean but it was right next to a generator which was a bit noisy.
reviews.title: Good Hotel Stay

reviews.text: The best part of our stay was the breakfast in the morning. It was a great selection and the staff was very friendly. I will not stay here again though on my next visit because there are many other hotels nearby to try.
reviews.title: Okay but FAR

reviews.text: The setting is convenient for the airport and there is a regular shuttle service. On the downside its miles from anywhere so you definately need a car.
reviews.title: Not a good Courtyard

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Miami Airport West/Doral Hotel
